special.name: Fly
special.effect: If the Sandle is willing, it can be worn and allow the wearer to Fly and survive in harsh conditions like space, sub zero and the sun's surface

special2.name: Create clone
special2.effect: Can clone itself 10 times for a total of 20 individual sandles. The life of the original doesn't matter, as long as one sandle is alive, it can make more of itself
